mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT SEND_MEMBER_ID sendMember FROM SNS_DM WHERE GET_MEMBER_ID=#{id}

SELECT DISTINCT tot.SENDMEMBER, tot.GETMEMBER, tot.CONTENTS, tot.DMDATE, tot.MEMBERPIC FROM SNS_DM INNER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DM.DM_DATE DESC) AS RANK,DM.SEND_MEMBER_ID SENDMEMBER, DM.GET_MEMBER_ID GETMEMBER, DM.DM_CONTENTS CONTENTS, DM.DM_DATE DMDATE, MB.MEMBER_PROFILE_PICTURE MEMBERPIC FROM SNS_DM DM INNER JOIN MEMBER MB ON DM.SEND_MEMBER_ID=MB.MEMBER_ID WHERE DM.GET_MEMBER_ID=#{id} AND DM.SEND_MEMBER_ID=#{userId} ORDER BY DM.DM_DATE) TOT ON SNS_DM.GET_MEMBER_ID=TOT.GETMEMBER WHERE tot.GETMEMBER=#{id} AND tot.SENDMEMBER=#{userId} AND tot.RANK=1
